parameters.name: VisibilityArray
parameters.description: Array of booleans indicating visiblity, in order, of ConfigArray items; null or Nothing to indicate that all configurations are visible

title: IFamilyTableFeature.SetConfigurations
description: Sets the configurations to use for this family table feature.
signature:
void SetConfigurations( 
   System.Object
ConfigArray
,
   System.Object
VisibilityArray
)

parameters.name: VisibilityArray
parameters.description: Array of booleans indicating visiblity, in order, of ConfigArray items; null or Nothing to indicate that all configurations are visible

remarks:
This method is valid only if
IFamilyTableFeature::GetUseAllConfigurations
is set to false.
